summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 32nd Avenue South, from Yesler Way to the south line of H.E. Holmes Addition; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8583 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
